    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dolg vodnik z enakomerno porazdeljenim tokom</string>
            <string language="en">A Long Wire with Uniform Current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine lange Leitung mit konstantem aktuellem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un long fil avec actuel uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um fio longo com atual uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un legare lungo con la corrente dell'Uniforme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μακρύ καλώδιο με το ομοιόμορφο ρεύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un alambre largo con la corriente Uniforme</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Magnetna poljska gostota znotraj in zunaj vodnika glede na oddaljenost od središča vodnika.</string>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field density outside and inside a current carrying wire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetna poljska gostota</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field density</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">ampere's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Dichte außerhalb
und innerhalb einer aktuellen tragenden Leitung auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Densité de champ magnétique en dehors et à 
l'intérieur d'un fil portant actuel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Densidade do campo magnético fora e dentro de um
fio carregando atual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Densità del campo magnetico fuori di ed 
all'interno di un legare trasportante corrente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυκνότητα μαγνητικών πεδίων έξω από και μέσα σε ένα
παρόν φέρνοντας καλώδιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Densidad del campo magnético fuera y dentro de 
un alambre que lleva actual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie Dichte auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Amperes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">densité de champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de l'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">densidade do campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">densità del campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dell'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυκνότητα μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
